name: Keep Your Distance (WeroCreative)
description:
Keep Your Distance from other people to stop the spread of diseases.

In this endless runner you need to move quickly to ensure a safe distance around yourself so you don't catch (or spread) anything!

It's more than just an endless runner: you can virtually stay home and relax!

The game is divided into two parts: the endless runner and a stay at home scene. Gameplay is predictable for the endless runner since it works well with the theme of keeping away from things. The other part takes place in the home in which the player can look outside or watch the TV.

Content warning: there are refrences to a certain virus in the game. This game is meant to provide a moment of play in an otherwise stressful (and very serious) time and issue.

Play the game embedded above our download the game below. 

Relax or endlessly stroll to the soothing sounds created by Monplaisir.

Designed by Adam Clare Twitter: @MrFacePlant

Distributed by Wero Creative.
